src.esercizio_esteso.crews.summarization_crew.config
====================================================

.. py:module:: src.esercizio_esteso.crews.summarization_crew.config

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Summarization Crew Configuration.

   This package contains YAML configuration files for the summarization crew,
   defining agents and tasks for document summarization operations.

   Files
   -----
   agents.yaml : file
       Configuration for document summarization agents with expertise
       in content analysis and summary generation.
   tasks.yaml : file
       Task definitions for document summarization workflow.

   .. rubric:: Notes

   The summarization crew specializes in processing large documents
   and creating concise, informative summaries while preserving
   key information and context.
